text: Bobby Murdoch (25 January 1936 - 12 February 2017) was an English footballer. He played as a striker. He played for Liverpool, Bolton Wanderers, Barrow, Stockport County, Carlisle United, Southport and Wigan Athletic. He was also a player-manager for the amateur club South Liverpool. He was born in Garston, Liverpool. Murdoch died on 12 February 2017, at the age of 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bobby Murdoch at LiverpoolFC.com Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:English footballers Category:English football managers Category:Liverpool F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Liverpool
title: Bobby Murdoch (footballer, born 1936)
